summary: My first companions mod, comes with 10 unique (1 is optional) and hand crafted Female companions. All of them can be found in the Sleeping Giants Inn, in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
CM_MyGurlz
=========================
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11669
^
Thanks for the read-me on how to fix the \"dark face\" bug when creating characters.

All characters are level 10 and can level with the player until level 80, they are all essential and u should be able to marry them. They are all female and work perfectly with the Multiple Followers mod (http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-multiple-followers/). They can all be found at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

3/20/2012
*Update: MyGuyz is up! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13345
*Update 2: Female Argonian is now available, she is separate and optional. She shares the same values as the others and is found in the same location.
=========================

Race: Argonian
Class: Mystic-Alteration
